ComicInfo.Summary: This is it! The showdown between the Patriots and the radioactive Stealthers! It's all-out action as becomes a raging battlefield, the fateful dividing line in determining the survival of . As a result, it's now up to Zach Donovan and Rocky Boorman — teamed with super-powered spy Nigel Harrington — to use all the hi-tech firepower that International Operations can muster to stop the villainous leader Larsen. The only problem is he's already triggered his own powers and is 60 seconds and counting from taking out all of in a nuclear blast!
ComicInfo.Title: Tower Bridge Is Falling Down!
